reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Scale-up of HIV prevention to contribute to reduction of HIV related morbidity and mortality by 2023

description.narrative: Cameroon - TB/HIV - Cameroon National Association for Family Welfare - CAMNAFAW. This program has the following goals: Réduire les nouvelles infections du VIH parmi les populations clés et vulnérables dont les adolescents et jeunes/ Reduce new HIV infections among key and vulnerable populations including adolescents and young people. Attémuer le fardeau socio-écononomique du VIH sur le développement du pays/Mitigating the social and economic burden of HIV on the country's development. Augmenter le taux de notification des cas de tuberculose à travers la recherche active des cas dans la communauté/ Increase the notification rate of tuberculosis cases through active case finding in the community. The objectives of this program are: Les infections par le VIH sont globalement réduites parmi les populations clés et les populations vulnérables, y compris les adolescents et les jeunes, et plus précisément de 19,70 % en 2016 à 13,64 % d'ici 2023 chez les HSH./ HIV infections are globally reduced among key populations and vulnerable populations, including adolescents and young people, and specifically from 19.70% in 2016 to 13.64% by 2023 among MSM.. Les infections par le VIH sont globalement réduites parmi les populations clés et les populations vulnérables, et plus particulièrement de 24,30 % en 2016 à 15,64 % d'ici 2023 chez les travailleurs du sexe. / HIV infections are globally reduced among key populations and vulnerable populations, and specifically from 24.30% in 2016 to 15.64% by 2023 among sex workers.. Le pourcentage d'hommes qui déclarent avoir utilisé un préservatif lors de leur dernier rapport sexuel anal avec un partenaire occasionnel passe de 76 % en 2016 à 80 % en 2023./ The percentage of men who report using a condom during their last anal intercourse with a casual partner increases from 76% in 2016, to 80% in 2023.. Le pourcentage de travailleurs du sexe qui déclarent avoir utilisé un préservatif avec leur dernier client passe de 91 % en 2016 à 95 % en 2023./ The percentage of sex workers who report having used a condom with their last client increases from 91% in 2016 to 95% in 2023.. Contribuer à ce que 34 286 nouveaux cas et rechutes de tuberculose (toutes formes confondues) soient déclarés d'ici 2023./ Contribute to ensuring that 34,286 new cases and relapses of tuberculosis (all forms) are reported by 2023.

title.narrative: Impact indicator for CMR-C-CMF
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
TB incidence rate per 100,000 population
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Coverage / Output indicator for CMR-C-CMF
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Proportion of community health workers who received at least one supportive supervision during the reporting period
Number of adolescent girls and young women who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of people in contact with TB patients who began preventive therapy
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Outcome indicator for CMR-C-CMF
Case notification rate of all forms of TB per 100,000 population - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Percentage of men who have sex with men who avoid health care because of stigma and discrimination
Percentage of people living with HIV reporting their rights were violated who sought legal redress
Percentage of sex workers who avoid health care because of stigma and discrimination
Percentage of people living with HIV who report experiences of HIV-related discrimination in health-care settings
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
